title: Hyundai Motor shares gain after Elliot calls for better governance
text:
SEOUL (Reuters) - Shares of Hyundai Motor Co ( 005380.KS ) gained 4.6 percent after a unit of U.S. activist hedge fund Elliott Management said the company needed to do more to improve governance, while welcoming the auto makerâ€™s decision to streamline its structure.
A Hyundai Motor's booth is seen near the Pyeongchang Olympic Plaza in Pyeongchang, South Korea, February 11, 2018. REUTERS/Kim Hong-Ji Hyundai Mobis, Hyundai's parts making affiliate, had jumped more than 5 percent as of 0014 GMT, versus the wider market's .KS11 0.1 percent fall.
Reporting by Dahee Kim and Ju-min Park; Editing by Stephen Coates
